subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Aaron Rodgers of the Green Bay Packers threw for four scores against a fierce Vikings pass rush to secure a victory and a lone berth as the N.F.L’s only undefeated team.
snippet: Quarterback Aaron Rodgers of the Green Bay Packers threw for four scores against a fierce Vikings pass rush to secure a victory and a lone berth as the N.F.L’s only undefeated team.
